annotations:
ATT- Chartering Desk
FM- SR Ship – SGP
Good day, Please propose for our below vessels :
01)MV. Jahan Brothers II (DWT: 56,014, SSW: 12.573 M, Built: 2008, HOLD: 5H/5H, GRD: 4X30 MT SWL, LOA: 189.99 M),
Opening CJK, China 13th August, 2024, Further details as per attached TC description
02)MV. Nazia Jahan (DWT: 58,110 SSW: 12.826 M, Built: 2010, HOLD: 5H/5H, GRD: 4X30MT SWL, LOA: 189.99 M),
Opening Chattogram, Bangladesh 14th August, 2024, Further details as per attached TC description
03) MV. Zahab Jahan I ex Nordic Stavanger (DWT: 56,172 SSW: 12.715 M, Built: 2011, HOLD: 5H/5H, GRD: 4X30M SWL, LOA: 189.99 M),
Opening Alexandria, Egypt 14th August, 2024, Further details as per attached TC description.
04) MV. Abdullah (DWT: 58,068 SSW: 12.826, Blt: 2015, HOLD: 5H/5H, GRD: 4X30M SWL, LOA: 189.93 M),
Opening Navalakhi, India 16th August 2024, Further details as per attached ship's particular
05) MV. Khadeejah Jahan I ex Maine Dream (DWT: 58,105 SSW: 12.826, Blt: 2012, HOLD: 5H/5H, GRD: 4X30M SWL, LOA: 189.99 M),
Opening Tokuyama, Japan 17th August 2024, Further details as per attached ship's particular
06) MV. Jahan Moni (DWT: 55,496, SSW: 12.502 M, Built: 2008, HOLD: 5H/5H, GRD: 4X30 MT SWL, LOA: 190 M),
Opening Dammam, Saudi Arabia 18th August 2024, Further details as per attached TC description
Best Regards.
Capt Shahid
SR SHIP (S) PTE LTD
10,Anson Road
#41-11,International Plaza
Singapore 079903
Tel : +65-62255540/62255167
Email :
mailto:Chartering@srshipsgp.com
mailto:Ops@srshipsgp.com
Skype:Capt Shahid 07
As agents only
Disclaimer:
The information contained in this email (including any attachments) is confidential ,is given in good faith, without prejudice, without any guarantee  and in the course of business of S.R Ship (S) Pte Ltd
( including but not limited to sale and purchase offers and inquiries, cargo and period orders,operations & Chartering activities , vessels’ positions & circulations etc.) only. In accordance with EU General Data
Protection Regulation (GDPR)(https://www.eugdpr.org/),& Singapore Data Protection Act 2012 Please notify us if you do NOT wish to receive any message from us. If you want to exercise your
right -to be forgotten- you may request from us to delete your personal data from our records at any given time.
Confidentiality Note: This e-mail may contain private, confidential or legally privileged information.Any unauthorized use, discussion, distribution, or copying of the information contained herein, is strictly prohibited.
If you are not the intended recipient, please immediately notify us by telephone, fax or e-mail and delete this message, without reviewing the contents hereof.
